Sadece oyuna ve valve'a olan (azıcık) saygımdan ötürü önerebilirim tabi kanser kitlesini ikide bir takıma gelen ingilizce info vermeyi bile beceremeyen rus,çocuk vb. leri saymazsak.Ses kasarak diğer fpslere nazaran sadece hipfire dediğmiz stille her silahın ayrı recoil sprey gibi mekanikleri doğal şekilde yedirmeleri,oyuncularca yapılan teamwork gerektiren boostlar ve ses kasarak veya görerek info vermek vb başarılınca güzel ve eğlenceli olabiliyor neyse amk oynayın...

Valve: You've got all the money in the world, do something about cheaters in CS:GO. Seriously. For years people have called for it. If you want to stay in business against upcoming tactical shooters, you won't come around the fact that you need a working Anti-Cheat-System.

Just don't even bother. Cs is a shit game in general. Don't make the same mistake as i did, don't even risk liking this game because I guarantee you will end up in a game with a hacker in low ranks, or with a bunch of angry (generally Russian) players who won't stop yelling down the mic, without realising you can't understand them.
